Question: Georg Wilhelm Richmann were indeed electrocuted during the months following this person's experiment.
Hints: This person wrote a scathing attack against the racial prejudice of the Paxton Boys.
This so enthused this person that he subscribed financially to the next project to build a manned hydrogen balloon.
The family attended the old South Church, the most liberal Puritan congregation in Boston, where this person was baptized in 1706.
